_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three trainings that include all the: The training in the higher ethics
The training in the higher mind
The training in the higher wisdom
The different outcomes based on the leve: Extinguished between one life and the next
Head upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm
